moduleMetadataJson.name: Upload and Execute
moduleMetadataJson.description: Push a file and execute it.
author: egypt <egypt@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FileDropperDelay
options.description: Delay in seconds before attempting cleanup

options.name: LPATH
options.description: Local file path to upload and execute

options.name: RPATH
options.description: Remote file path on target (default is basename of LPATH)

options.name: ARGS
options.description: Command-line arguments to pass to the uploaded file
